name: Level Mount Full Motion Single Arm Wall Mount for 10 - 32 in. TVs

reviews.name: Level TV Wall Mount Full Motion Mount Fits 10-32" TVs
reviews.reviewText: You can't beat this mount. I used it for a 22" Vizio, and it works perfectly. I could have easily spent another $50 to accomplish the same thing. On the downside, the built in level isn't the most accurate, but if you have a level, it's no biggie. They do include a stud finder that leaves a little to be desired, but at least they include one. Overall, I am very happy, and would recommend this mount.
reviews.title: Does the job.

reviews.name: Level TV Wall Mount Full Motion Mount Fits 10-32" TVs
reviews.reviewText:
This product WILL NOT fit VESA 200 as advertised. I bought a Sanyo 26inch from Walmart and ordered this online. Drilled holes in the wall for the mount and realized the TV takes 200X200 and this mount will only do 200X100, so only two screws could connect it to the TV; not secure, not happening. The advertising is misleading so avoid the mistake I made.
Otherwise, it is very solid, easy to install for any TV will 200X100, or less. But, it will not fit all TV as implied. Someone needs to clean up their act on writing these promos. This ones going back for refund.
reviews.title: Be careful....

reviews.name: Level TV Wall Mount Full Motion Mount Fits 10-32" TVs
reviews.reviewText:
This has to be THE best bargain when purchasing a flat screen TV. I purchased a 19" HDTV to replace a 5" B&W that I've used daily for over 35 years. This bracket does the job at a VERY low price.

The install was simple, with a bubble level even built into the bracket's mounting plate so all you have to do is securely mount 2 screws and you're done. Since I was mounting to a plaster wall and the studs were not where I needed them to be, I used toggle bolts that could support a 90 lb load - No Problem.

EXCELLENT wall mount especially for tight places (like a bathroom corner)
reviews.title: Flat Screen Wall Mount Bracket

reviews.name: Level TV Wall Mount Full Motion Mount Fits 10-32" TVs
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install and does exactly what I needed it to do. We can tilt the tv or move it to either side for the best view for whatever we're doing- watching a movie or playing a video game.
reviews.title: exactly what I needed

reviews.name: Level TV Wall Mount Full Motion Mount Fits 10-32" TVs
reviews.reviewText:
I went searching around at different places in stores and online, and nothing compares to this product. Besides the cheap price, it does what you want it to do. I bought this for my fiance for his 32'' flat screen, and it looks great. The instructions are very easy to read as well as easy to follow. The only downfall was the screws that came with the mount,they weren't going in with normal force. So extra force was needed, even with a power drill. The quality of the product is wonderful.

When I read some old reviews, I was skeptical because of the VESA and was nervous about it not fitting. However it did fit. Which I was super excited about it.

The great thing about this is the price. When searching, prices ranged from $79 to $150, $79 for the flat, no motion mount.
reviews.title: AMAZING!
